title: Behind the Weld: Retired Boilermaker John Tracey Reflects on His Time at Delmade

tasks.task: Have an interview with a Delmade employee about their experience and job role.
subtasks: Introduce the person being interviewed (John Tracy).
Ask about their background and where they're from.
Inquire about their career path and how they ended up at Delmade.
Discuss any changes at Delmade over the years.
Talk about the machinery they worked on, specifically rollers.
Reflect on the quality and reputation of the machinery produced.
Give career advice based on their experience.
Share the feeling of being part of Delmade's 50-year history.

tasks.task: Discuss specific tasks related to the construction of farm machinery.
subtasks: Describe building new machinery, like the first big roller.
Mention unique challenges faced when constructing heavy machinery.
Discuss the farmer's role in seeing their creations in the field later.

tasks.task: Address safety considerations mentioned in the conversation.
subtasks: Emphasize the importance of safety gear and breathing apparatus.
Highlight the rewarding aspect of seeing the implemented machinery in use.
